page.title: 13UTILITIES Melton Ross/Elsham
page.content: The square involved includes no villages,Melton Ross village lies to the South East and Elsham village to the West. Inhabited buildings are found in only 4 of the 12 grid squares,generally in small clusters. All inhabited houses and warehouse premises have an electricity supply from the Y.E.B.Most houses are on mains water but not mains sewerage. In the north of our area, adjacent to Race lane, high on the Wolds, there is a small Gas Installation,commission -ed in 1964.This equipment takes a supply of North Sea Natural Gas at high pressure from an underground pipe -line, and reduces it's pressure for distribution to parts of South Humber -side.Singleton Birch quarry Kilns are a nearby major user of North Sea Gas.
